import "./Movies.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import default_image from "../../assents/images/default.svg" import star from "../../assents/icons/star.svg" import chair_director from "../../assents/icons/chair-director-icon.svg" import calendar from "../../assents/icons/calendar-icon.svg" import Carousel from "react-elastic-carousel" export default function Movies({films}) { const breakPoints = [ { width: 1 , itemsToShow: 1}, { width: 500 , itemsToShow: 3}, ]; return (

Movies

{films.map( movie =>
{movie.title}

{movie.text}

{movie.director}

{movie.date}

)}
); };
